name: getVolumeRamp(for:startVolume:endVolume:timeRange:)
desc: Retrieves the volume ramp that includes the specified time.
declaration:
func getVolumeRamp(for time: CMTime, 
       startVolume: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>?, 
         endVolume: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>?, 
         timeRange: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTimeRange>?) -> Bool
